MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Tufanbeyli Project in Middle East, Turkey dated July 2013.pdf

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Tufanbeyli Project in Middle East, Turkey dated July 2013.pdf
document.description: This report is a National Instrument 43-101 Technical Report on the Tufanbeyli Zinc Project in Turkey, prepared by The MSA Group for Red Crescent Resources Limited, focusing on the assessment and potential of the project's mineral resources.
